string.text: ArtiGrok Ballistics - Merge & Extension of GBO and ArtiBalls
Turning this on will allow "Recycler" to give you a higher chance of getting more ammo materials back when breaking down ammo.\n \nTurning this off will allow Ammo Maker to work normally.
Certain special/variant ammo give off special particle effects when firing. Turn these off if they are too distracting when firing.

Turning this on will enable NPCs to follow the same outgoing damage calculations that the player follows when hitting NPCs and mutants.
 
NPCs will not use any special ammo effects to avoid any crashes. This will also not affect NPCs hitting the player as that is handled seperately.
 
Turning this off will make NPCs' outgoing damage calculations return to normal.

Turning this on will enable NPCs to utilize most special effects when hitting NPCs and mutants.
 
You need ot have "NPCs Use Ballistics System" enabled.
 
%c[d_red]THIS MAY BE UNSTABLE - USE AT YOUR OWN RISK

Turning this on will calculate damage falloff utilizing the weapon's stats rather than it slowly starting immediately.\n \nTurning this off will have damage falloff work as base GAMMA (with falloff starting immediately).

Turning this on will enable GAMMA's difficulty scaling on all outgoing player and (with the option enabled) NPC Stalker damage. This setting only allows scaling to affect damage (i.e. Hard reduces outgoing player damage/increases NPC-to-NPC damage by 20%).\n \nTurning this off will turn scaling off, leaving damage untouched on all difficulties.

Turning this on will enable GAMMA's difficulty scaling on all outgoing player and (with the option enabled) NPC Stalker AP power. This setting only allows scaling to affect AP power (i.e. Hard reduces outgoing player AP power/increases NPC-to-NPC AP power by 20%).\n \nTurning this off will turn scaling off, leaving AP power untouched on all difficulties.
